title: Matplotlib MRI Image Visualization
description: In this lab, you will learn how to read an MRI image into a NumPy array and display it in grayscale using matplotlib library.

meta.title: MRI Image Processing | NumPy | Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to read an MRI image into a NumPy array and display it in grayscale using the Matplotlib library.
meta.keywords: MRI image processing, NumPy, Matplotlib, Python, medical imaging
